Description: Fragment of foot in two degrees of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix, type C; broad foot and narrow stem; moulded outer edge of foot; glazed black on top and underside; reserved: outer face of foot; inscription cut on underside.
Curator's comments: For the shape compare British Museum 1836,0224.131 (E67) by the Castelgiorgio painter.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 512)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1491)
